name: Silk Rope/Sideway Cross Bracelet
description:
Trendy and unique way to express your faith with this sideway hammered cross bracelet. Made from three nicely coordinating silk ropes (twisted) and fits all sizes with adjustable clasp. These bracelets will make great gifts of encouragement for yourself/others or the perfect accessory for bridal parties, ministries, growth groups, etc.

Faith Bracelet :: {Made to Order} :: ALLOW 3 - 5 days
(Listing is for one bracelet - Turquoise, Cream, and Deep Purple)

::Bracelet Features:: 
*Made from quality silk rope
*Accented with (silver plated) hammered cross
*Adjustable lobster clasp with extension (Approximate 6 inches to 8 inches)
*Packaged in a hot pink organza bag with tag

::Color Options::
Faith - Turquoise, Cream, Deep Purple
Hope - Red, Tan, Navy
Love - Turquoise, Tan, Olive
Joy - Pink, Cream, Navy
Peace - Turquoise, Tan, Pink
Grace - Brown, Pink, Olive

name: Minky Ribbon Blanket-Mod Geo
description:
A super soft cozy/lovie blanket for baby or infant to play with or carry on the go. Blanket is made from high quality fabric, super soft white minky, embellished with folded coordinating ribbons (1.5-2"), and top-stitched for durability. Blankets make great gifts for showers, birthdays, or any "lovie" event!

Measurements: 17" W x 17" H (Approximate) 

Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low, medium low iron as needed (do not iron minky).

name: Sequoia Large Clutch - Morracan Escapade
description:
Stylish & functional large clutch or wristlet to carry your everyday necessitates while expressing your faith! Clutches are great for on the go, cosmetics, or to organize your bag/purse. These clutches will make great gifts of encouragement or the perfect accessory for bridal parties, ministries, growth groups, etc.

::Clutch Features:: 
*9" W x 5" H x 1.5" D (Approximate) with 6.5" detachable key chain 
*Zippered design 
*Designed with high quality fabrics 
*Interfaced/batting for structure 
*Two coordinating ruffles | Scripture sentiment | Sequoia inspirational charm. 
(Inside lining, zipper, and thread color will vary and will coordinate with main fabric selection)

::Care:: 
Recommend spot clean or machine wash cold, lay flat to dry, medium low iron as needed. Clutch has been treated with Fabric Scotchguard to help repel stains.

**9.25% TN sales tax will be added to purchase upon checkout for TN residents only.**

name: Sequoia Pouch - Golden Floral Escape
description:
Stylish & functional zippered pouch to carry your small and on-the-go everyday necessitates (License/Id, debit and credit cards, cash and change, business card, lip balm, etc.) while offering a devotional sentiment. These pouches will make great gifts/favors, bridal parties, ministries, growth groups, etc.

This pouch incorporates a zippered design with a key ring to easily attach to your keys. The pouch design includes high quality fabrics with a pleated front design, interface/batting for structure, a devotional sentiment, and a sequoia inspirational charm. (Inside lining, zipper, and thread color will vary and will coordinate with main fabric selection)

Measurements: (Approximate)
5" W x 3.5" H with 1" key ring (4'' zipper opening)

Care: Spot clean or machine wash cold, lay flat to dry, medium low iron as needed. Pouch has been treated with Fabric Scotchguard to help repel stains.

**9.25% TN sales tax will be added to purchase upon checkout for TN residents only.**
